#summary Upcoming releases

The from version 0.5.x, the version string is composed of three number. 
 # The first number is 0 :)
 # The second number is the long iteration. Long iterations are about a month long and address a specific functionality.
 # The third number is the short iteration. Short iterations add small functionalities and fixes.

= Version 0.4 =

The main focus of release 0.4 is comments and todo editing.
